# UILetterformAwareSizingRule

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify typographic bounds-sizing behavior to handle text in fonts with oversize characters.

## Declaration

```swift
enum UILetterformAwareSizingRule
```

## Overview

For more information on typographic bounds sizing behavior, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILetterformAwareAdjusting].

## Setting bounds-sizing behavior

- **UILetterformAwareSizingRule.oversize**: Bounds-sizing behavior that displays oversize characters fully but may negatively impact typographic alignment.
- **UILetterformAwareSizingRule.typographic**: Standard typographic bounds-sizing behavior, which may clip oversize characters.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Specifying text-sizing behavior

- **sizingRule**: The typographic bounds-sizing behavior that handles text with fonts that contain oversize characters.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
